results.description: Juventus take control of the Champions League Group D destiny by brushing aside Bayer Leverkusen in Turin.
results.title: Juventus 3-0 Bayer Leverkusen: Juve join Atletico Madrid at top of Champions League group

results.description: Holders Liverpool will face Napoli, Salzburg and Genk in the Champions League group stage, while Tottenham will meet Bayern Munich.
results.title: Champions League draw: Liverpool drawn with Napoli, Tottenham to meet Bayern Munich

thumbnail.altText: Jurgen Klopp, Frank Lampard, Mauricio Pochettino, Pepe Guardiola

results.description: Bayer Leverkusen hit six goals in the first 36 minutes to boost their Champions League hopes by thrashing Bundesliga top-four rivals Eintracht Frankfurt.
results.shortTitle: Leverkusen score six in first 36 minutes
results.title: Bayer Leverkusen 6-1 Eintracht Frankfurt: Hosts thrash top-four rivals

thumbnail.altText: Lukas Hradecky (L) and Leverkusen's German midfielder Julian Brandt

results.description: Matheus Cunha scores an absolutely incredible solo goal as RB Leipzig staged a comeback to win 4-2 against Bayer 04 Leverkusen.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Cunha scores stunning solo goal for Leipzig
results.title: Matheus Cunha caps off RB Leipzig comeback with incredible solo goal

results.description: Hannover's Genki Haraguchi is denied a certain goal in their 3-2 defeat against Bayer Leverkusen when the ball gets stuck in the snow before it crosses the line.
results.title: Snow denies Hannover goal in Bundesliga

results.description: Jadon Sancho scores an excellent volley as Bundesliga leaders Borussia Dortmund beat Bayer Leverkusen 3-2 for their first win in six games in all competitions.
results.shortTitle: Sancho hits brilliant volley against Leverkusen
results.title: Jadon Sancho scores volley for Borussia Dortmund against Bayer Leverkusen

results.description: Jadon Sancho scores an excellent volley as Bundesliga leaders Borussia Dortmund beat Bayer Leverkusen for their first win in six games.
results.shortTitle: Sancho helps Dortmund end winless run
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 3-2 Bayer Leverkusen: Jadon Sancho helps leaders end winless run

results.description: Bayern Munich's hopes of a seventh successive Bundesliga title suffer a blow as Bayer Leverkusen come from a goal down to win.
results.shortTitle: Bayern lose as title hopes suffer blow
results.title: Bayern Munich beaten by Bayer Leverkusen as Borussia Dortmund extend title lead

results.description: Claudio Pizarro becomes only the second 40-year-old to score a Bundesliga goal - but his Werder Bremen side are thrashed by Bayer Leverkusen.
results.shortTitle: Pizarro scores for 19th year in row
results.title: Werder Bremen 2-6 Bayer Leverkusen: Claudio Pizarro scores for 19th year in row

results.description: English 18-year-old Jadon Sancho set up his fourth and fifth goals of the season as Borussia Dortmund beat Bayer Leverkusen 4-2 to move top of the Bundesliga.
results.shortTitle: Sancho helps Dortmund go top of Bundesliga
results.title: Jadon Sancho with two assists in Borussia Dortmund's 4-2 win over Bayer Leverkusen

results.description: Jadon Sancho sets up two goals as Borussia Dortmund come from 2-0 to beat Bayer Leverkusen and move top of the Bundesliga.
results.shortTitle: Two assists for Sancho as Dortmund go top
results.title: Bayer Leverkusen 2-4 Borussia Dortmund: Jadon Sancho helps Dortmund go top

results.description: Bayer Leverkusen winger Karim Bellarabi leaves hospital following his collapse from exhaustion in a pre-season friendly.
results.title: Karim Bellarabi: Bayer Leverkusen winger leaves hospital after collapsing

results.description: Germany goalkeeper Bernd Leno agrees to join Arsenal from Bayer Leverkusen for a reported 22m euros (£19.3m).
results.shortTitle: Goalkeeper Leno agrees to join Arsenal
results.title: Arsenal: Goalkeeper Bernd Leno agrees to join from Bayer Leverkusen

results.description: Englishman Jadon Sancho scores his first senior goal and gets two assists as Borussia Dortmund thrash Bayer Leverkusen.
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 4-0 Bayer Leverkusen

results.description: Follow live coverage of Barcelona's visit to Celta Vigo in La Liga, plus updates from Bayer Leverkusen v Bayern Munich in the German Cup semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Celta Vigo level against Barca, plus eight goals in Leverkusen v Bayern
results.title: Live: Celta Vigo v Barcelona, plus Bayer Leverkusen v Bayern Munich

results.description: Bayern Munich go 14 points clear at the top of the Bundesliga after beating Bayer Leverkusen following the winter break.
results.title: Bayer Leverkusen 1-3 Bayern Munich
